thread.title: Relativity, Creditors Work Through Sale Objections
thread.title_full: Relativity, Creditors Work Through Sale Objections - WSJ

author: Tom Corrigan
title: Relativity, Creditors Work Through Sale Objections
text:
Relativity Media LLC moved closer to auctioning off its film and TV business after resolving a long list of objections from creditors, though it remains up to a bankruptcy court to give final approval to the rules governing the sale.
At the outset of Tuesdayâ€™s hearing in Manhattan, Relativity announced that 12 of 16 objections to its fast-tracked sale process had been resolved, though many creditors reserved the right to raise their...
